name: Close Combat 2: A Bridge Too Far
name_original: Close Combat 2: A Bridge Too Far
description:
Close Combat 2: A Bridge Too Far is a strategy game developed by Atomic Games. It was originally released in 1996. Slitherine published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Close Combat 2: A Bridge Too Far is available on PC. The game is sold via GOG.
